level.heading: Power of personal representative of deceased member.
level.text: If a member dies, the deceased member's personal representative or other legal representative may exercise the rights of a transferee provided in § 29- 805.02(c) and, for the purposes of settling the estate, the rights of a current member under § 29-804.10.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 504 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
